title: Vermicelli Kheer/ Semiya Payasam
content: Ingredients: Vermicelli - 1 cup Milk - 5 cups Sugar - 3/4th cup Ghee - 3 tb sp Almond Flakes - 2 tb sp Procedure: -- Take a pan add one tb sp of ghee fry vermicelli with low heat till golden brown color and then take out vermicelli in a bowl -- Now add almond flakes in the same pan fry till golden brown color and then take out in a bowl -- Next add fried vermicelli in the pan and add Milk in it with low to medium heat , stir the content in between so that it won't sticky to the pan -- When milk boils at that time add sugar and 2 tb sp of ghee -- Stir the content until it becomes like kheer consistency -- At that moment switch off the Burner and add fried almond flakes -- Serve it in a bowl Follow us: Facebook Instagram Twitter Google+ Share your comments in below section, I like to know your feedback © 2017- 2018 Ramyarecipes
